snippet: The state of New York spends an average of $18,126 annually a student, and a group is seeking an additional $4,750 annually for every poor student.
lead_paragraph: The state of New York spends an average of $18,126 annually a student, and a group is seeking an additional $4,750 annually for every poor student.

headline.main: Group Urges More Money to Aid Poor in School
headline.print_headline: Group Urges More Money To Aid Poor In School
headline.seo: Group Calls for More Spending on New York Students
